description: Try our easy to follow Salmon Mini Rolls, Pear And Cheese And Crackers recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Salmon Mini Rolls, Pear And Cheese And Crackers
name: Salmon Mini Rolls, Pear And Cheese And Crackers Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Cut a quarter from the top of each nori sheet and discard. Place one sheet of nori, shiny side down, on a bamboo mat. Dip your hands into a bowl of cold water then spread half the rice evenly over the bottom 2/3 of sheet, leaving a small border around edge. Place half the salmon along middle of rice. Top with some cucumber. Lift the end of the mat closest to you, roll it over the ingredients to enclose and continue to make a complete roll. Repeat with remaining ingredients to make another roll. Cover in plastic wrap and refrigerate until ready to pack in lunch box. Cut 1 roll into 6 slices and pack into lunch box. Snack 1: Pack pear in lunch box. Snack 2: Serve crackers with cheese. note: salmon mini rolls recipe serves 2
